# datapower_formsloginpolicy (Data Source)

HTML forms login policy

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_formsloginpolicy" "test" {
  app_domain = "acceptance_test"
}
```

### Nested Schema for `result.dependency_actions`

Optional:
